<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create Instances</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Create Instances. You can specify SSH key or password.
Password required must contain different case, including numbers and special characters.
